txt.en: 'Well, the decision is before me. Do we evacuate, and flee before those we exiled, simply because they have a new master? Or do we protect Langhold, the northern keep of the Riddermark?'
'It is over, [placeholder]. Langhold is naught but smouldering wood and ashes now. I will make for Harwick to see to the women and children there, and give aid to the survivors, for that is my duty.'
'Let us think on this matter together, [placeholder]! By your account, there isn't much time.'
War is certainly at Langhold's door, and Thane Utred must choose whether to defend his city, or ensure the safety of those who serve him.
Help Thane Utred make his decision
Thane Utred must decide whether to defend or evacuate Langhold.
Dala stands at Tunbert's farm near Langhold.\n\nYou should speak with Dala.
